articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Adobe predicts AI-assisted online shopping to grow 520% during the 2025 U.S. holiday season - TechCrunch
articles.description: AI-assisted online shopping is still booming, new U.S. holiday e-commerce forecast shows.
articles.content: The U.S. holiday shopping season is expected to bring in $253.4 billion in online sales this year, up 5.3% year-over-year, according to a new report from Adobe’s e-commerce connected division, Adobe … [+2862 chars]

articles.title: OpenAI, Jony Ive struggle with technical details on secretive new AI gadget - Ars Technica
articles.description: ChatGPT maker working with former Apple design boss to launch personal assistant.
